notes: Modern high-rise building (13 floors) with colorful LED lighting on exterior, clean and well-maintained interior with white cabinetry and built-in storage. Floor plan shows 2 bedrooms, living/dining area, kitchen with balcony, and bathroom - good layout for a family. For baby safety, note the low platform bed frame has edges to watch, and the floor-to-ceiling windows in bedroom will need childproofing; good natural light from large windows.
